critique: This executive order focuses heavily on immigration enforcement, prioritizing the removal of aliens who pose a risk to public safety or national security, have committed crimes, or violated immigration laws. It also targets sanctuary jurisdictions and aims to increase the number of immigration officers. The order emphasizes the faithful execution of immigration laws and seeks to empower state and local law enforcement agencies in immigration enforcement. It also includes provisions for supporting victims of crimes committed by removable aliens. Overall, the document reflects a conservative approach to immigration, prioritizing enforcement and national security.
